import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; //global var idno; export default class edit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { uname:'', email:'', phone:'', txtConformation:'' } } render() { idno = this.props.match.params.idno console.log(idno) var {id, name, email, phone } = this.state return (<>

EDIT COMPONENT PAGE

GOTO BACK
) } //restapi calls componentDidMount() { const url=`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${idno}` axios.get(url).then((result)=> this.setState(result.data)); } }
